oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Soldiers digging themselves in for the night

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soldiers; Military personnel; Uniforms; Military uniforms; Helmets; Arms & armament; Rifles; Gas masks; Campaigns & battles; War; World War, 1914-1918; Trench warfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A group of American soldiers are resting after a battle that had begun in the morning. They are positioned behind a trench or a small hill and are getting ready to rest for the evening.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: United States. Army. Signal Corps.
